Title: Song a Day World
Description: Self-described as 'Song A Day is a journal. It is quite literally a record of my creative life.', this site is... intriguing. I don't know how I feel about the NFT and auction stuff. I don't even understand exactly what he's doing with it, tbh. But Jonathan Mann has been writing a song a day for over a decade, and that's pretty cool. He's also the guy who wrote the song for the iPhone 4 antenna issue, and the ATP podcast theme. So there's that.
